title: Touching Horizons
description: In a land ruled by kings and hidden beasts, a single peasant must fight for survival. When Ivan falls into a forbidden love with a betrothed princess, he finds that he must battle through unthinkable horrors to remain standing strong for her. After the two make a desperate escape under the hands of a tyrannical king, their love is put to the test, and they must find a way not only to survive, but to hold onto each other in the storm.
author: Alyssa Tucker
